targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  STR_TO_DATE(ftime, '%Y%m%d') as time_sec,
  sum(nowx_mau) as value,
  concat(platform, '') as metric
FROM rd_qmkg_pushmail_index_log
WHERE ftime >= date_format(date($__timeFrom()), '%Y%m%d') 
and ftime<=date_format(date($__timeTo()), '%Y%m%d')
and platform = -914
group by ftime, platform
ORDER BY ftime ASC

  STR_TO_DATE(ftime, '%Y%m%d') as time_sec,
